level_description: Analysis, pattern recognition, and content understanding cards for situational comprehension
level_purpose: Analyze, classify, and understand content to build situational awareness and context
business_value: Transform raw data into meaningful insights and contextual understanding

cards.primary_function: Entity extraction, sentiment analysis, and AI-powered content classification
Compare multiple documents using similarity analysis and structural comparison
Intelligent document querying using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)
Connect to expert LLM interfaces for domain-specific insights and consultation

stage_characteristics.ai_involvement: High - complex reasoning and pattern recognition

recommended_flow: Receive processed data from Observe stage
Build situational understanding for Decide stage
